#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Shaft.

== Name ==

*[CShaft Shaft]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Shaft (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Descriptive elements for the shaft of a golf club.
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
    
===  Model ===

	<...  type = [SGolfClubTypeEnum GolfClubTypeEnum]>  (manufacturer, model, submodel?, [CLengthWithUnits length]?, weight?, tip?  )</...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CLengthWithUnits golfml:LengthWithUnits] || [CLengthWithUnits length] ||  					Length of a shaft.				 ||
|| xs:string || manufacturer ||  					Manufacturer of a shaft.				 ||
|| xs:string || model ||  					Model of a shaft.				 ||
|| xs:string || submodel ||  					Sub-model or type of a model of a shaft.				 ||
|| xs:string || tip ||  					Type of tip of the shaft.				 ||
|| xs:float || weight ||  					Weight of a shaft.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
|| type ||  				Type of golf club for the shaft.			 || [SGolfClubTypeEnum golfml:GolfClubTypeEnum] || optional ||  ||  || unqualified ||


===  Local Usage ===

    	[CGolfClub GolfClub]
----
